2002.context: Tenable Holdings, Inc. is a cyber exposure management company focused on vulnerability management, cloud security, and exposure analytics. Founded. Nessus vulnerability scanner.

competitors.name: Very Limited Competition
competitors.notes: In 2002, Nessus was pioneering the remote vulnerability scanner market. Tenable founded in 2002.

2025.context: Tenable Holdings, Inc. is a cyber exposure management company focused on vulnerability management, cloud security, and exposure analytics. Exposure management leader. Competing with Qualys, Rapid7.

competitors.name: Qualys
competitors.notes: Most direct like-for-like rival in vulnerability and exposure management. Competes with comprehensive cloud-based VMDR platform and extensive vulnerability detection signature coverage.

competitors.name: Rapid7 InsightVM
competitors.notes: Other major competitor in vulnerability and exposure management. Cloud-based successor to Nexpose focusing on 'vulnerability risk management' with live dashboards, risk-based prioritization, and deep integrations into ticketing, CI/CD, and wider Rapid7 Insight platform.

competitors.name: CrowdStrike Falcon Spotlight
competitors.notes: Main competitor when buyers want VM built directly into EDR instead of separate scanner. Endpoint-focused VM module on Falcon agent providing real-time exposure views and patch status. Plugs into broader Falcon Exposure Management/RBVM stack with ExPRT.AI.

competitors.name: Wiz
competitors.notes: One of fastest-growing CNAPP providers. Best Tenable VM alternative according to G2. Agentless approach makes deployment almost instant. Without need for agents or sensors, provides comprehensive visibility across multi-cloud environments. Sets apart from Tenable's agent-based model.

competitors.name: Aqua Security
competitors.notes: Specializes in Kubernetes-native security and runtime protection for container-heavy setups. Competes in cloud-native security and container vulnerability management.

competitors.name: Armis
competitors.notes: Asset/exposure management platform appearing on competitive shortlists. Focuses on visibility and security for connected assets including IoT and OT devices.

competitors.name: Axonius
competitors.notes: Asset/exposure management platform appearing on competitive shortlists. Provides comprehensive asset inventory and management across security and IT environments.

competitors.name: Tanium
competitors.notes: Offers real-time endpoint visibility and vulnerability management competing with Tenable in enterprise vulnerability assessment space.

competitors.name: Vicarius
competitors.notes: Emerging platform competing in vulnerability management with focus on automation and remediation capabilities.

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Xpanse
competitors.notes: Major platform offering attack surface management and exposure management through different module approach. Part of broader Palo Alto security portfolio.

competitors.name: Cisco Vulnerability Management (formerly Kenna.VM)
competitors.notes: Alternative according to G2. Risk-based vulnerability management platform acquired by Cisco, competing with contextual risk scoring and prioritization.

mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Direct competitor with Nessus vulnerability scanner and Nexpose (later InsightVM). Tenable competed strongly with both on-premises and cloud-based vulnerability management solutions, known for extensive CVE coverage.

mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Direct competitor with on-premises and cloud options

mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Direct competitor with Exposure Management Platform, offers on-premises option

mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: One of the most prominent competitors offering Tenable.io and Nessus, the widely-used vulnerability scanner. Competes directly in vulnerability management and exposure management with comprehensive vulnerability coverage and cloud-based assessment.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Leading vulnerability scanning with Nessus engine

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Major competitor with Nessus scanner and Nexpose vulnerability management (later InsightVM). Tenable was recognized as an industry leader with extensive plugin database and vulnerability coverage.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: VM specialist competing directly with InsightVM

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Key competitor in vulnerability management business. Provides Nessus scan engine which is reliable and accurate. More capable than Rapid7 InsightVM in pricing and policy customization. Tenable Vulnerability Management provides industry's most comprehensive vulnerability coverage with real-time continuous assessment.
